definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: II. [[פרע]] (√ of foll.; cf. Syr. fara9a sprout; As.pir’u, sprout, progeny, pirtu, hair of head; late Ar. pra9 sprout (Schroeter in Me:Archiv. i. 176 Dozy:ii.256), fara9a long hair of woman;—on this and foll. √ v. Schulthess:Hom. Wurx. 56 Nö:ZMG iiv (1900), 154).
